name: Ruya (itch) (University of Suffolk)
description:
Ruya, the multi award winning game by Miracle Tea Studios.

As described on their website: "A game of tranquillity through the art of matching cute characters in Ruya’s world of dreams.

Visit surrealist landscapes, decorate yourself in flowers and introspect.

A calming minimal experience with juicy interactions and cool colour combinations to make you feel at ease.

The ethereal dreamlike soundtrack will tickle your senses and pull you into a state of peaceful flow."
